thread.title: Hillary Clinton to visit with union, hold rally post-debate
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton to visit with union, hold rally post-debate - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Hillary Clinton to visit with union, hold rally post-debate
text: LAS VEGAS (AP) Â— Hillary Clinton is planning campaign stops at a union training center and the Springs Preserve after Tuesday's Democratic presidential debate in Las Vegas. Clinton is planning to visit the International Union of Painters and Allied Trades training center in Henderson on Wednesday. She'll hold a rally that evening at the Springs Preserve, with doors opening at 4:30 p.m. Members of the public are invited to attend the rally and are asked to RSVP at hillaryclinton.com/NevadaRally. Clinton is in Nevada for the first of six Democratic debates. Tuesday's matchup will be televised on CNN and hosted at the Wynn resort on the Las Vegas Strip. Subscribe to The Tampa Tribune
